quest.name: The Yolk's on You
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Dalric has need of your eggspertise.
objectives: Deliver the phorusrhacos egg to the warehouse custodian.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: Twine used to be full of hunters, bringing in fresh meat, pelts, all sorts. Not these days, though. Most of them left to seek easier, more lucrative prey elsewhere.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: Still, there's money to be made here, if you're brave enough. How about it? Fancy earning a bit of coin?

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: I'm sure you have seen the phorusrhacos around here. Big, ugly, highly aggressive. What I want is not their meat, but their eggs.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: They are a job to carry though, so you'll want to avoid any trouble on your way back from the nest. There's no use bringing a smashed one.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: If you and the egg both make it back in one piece, bring it here, and the bloke in charge of the warehouse'll take it off your hands. There's gil in it for the both us.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: The warehouse custodian pays good coin for any meat or eggs, what with them being so hard to come by. Just so you know, I'll be getting a cut for anything you bring, since it was my idea.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This egg has a large crack along the shell. You should try to find one that is in better condition.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A strong scent of ammonia emanates from the egg. No one in their right mind would accept this.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A perfect specimen! Now you must keep it in pristine condition on your journey to the pub in Twine.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the phorusrhacos egg to the warehouse custodian in Twine.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have ninety seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must keep the egg in pristine condition on your journey to the pub in Twine.

dialogue.name: MINER03506
dialogue.text: You must be the lasslad who's bringin' me a phorusrhacos egg. I'll know if you try to cheat me, so don't even think about it!

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: It'll be easier if you bring the egg straight to the pub.

dialogue.name: MINER03506
dialogue.text: Oh yes, lovely! You don't see many like this! Well, that's Dalric's part of the bargain taken care of. He's got your share, so if you want payin', ask him.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: Seems to me you've got a talent for this kind of work. I could use someone like you.

dialogue.name: DALRIC
dialogue.text: First of all, here's the coin I promised. If you've got a mind to take on another job, come and see me.

obj.n: Taken Down a Peck or Two
